recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
steps: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente.
In a separate pan, fry the pancetta with the garlic until the pancetta is crisp.
Beat the eggs in a bowl, then add the grated pecorino and parmesan. Mix well.
Remove the garlic from the pan and discard.
Drain the spaghetti and add to the pan with the pancetta. Remove from heat.
Quickly add the egg and cheese mixture, stirring vigorously to create a creamy sauce.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: A popular Indian dish of grilled chicken in a rich, spiced tomato sauce.
steps: Cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces and marinate in yogurt, garlic, ginger, garam masala, turmeric, and chili powder for at least 1 hour.
Grill the marinated chicken until fully cooked.
In a pan, saut√© the chopped onion until golden brown.
Add the tomato paste and cook for a few minutes.
Pour in the coconut milk and bring to a simmer.
Add the grilled chicken to the sauce and cook for another 10 minutes.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve with rice or naan.

recipes.name: Classic BLT Sandwich
recipes.description: A simple and delicious sandwich made with crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, and ripe tomatoes.
steps: Cook the bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crispy. Drain on paper towels.
Toast the bread slices until golden brown.
Spread mayonnaise on one side of each slice of bread.
Layer the lettuce, tomato slices, and bacon on two slices of the bread.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Top with the remaining slices of bread, cut in half, and serve.

recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.description: A hearty salad with grilled chicken, crisp romaine, parmesan, and Caesar dressing.
steps: Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat and cook the chicken until fully cooked, about 6-7 minutes per side. Let it rest, then slice.
In a large bowl, combine the chopped romaine, parmesan, and croutons.
Add the sliced chicken to the salad.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and toss to combine.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Chicken Avocado Burrito
recipes.description: A tasty burrito filled with grilled chicken, avocado, black beans, and cheese.
steps: Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat and cook the chicken until fully cooked, about 6-7 minutes per side. Let it rest, then slice.
Warm the tortillas in a dry skillet or microwave.
In each tortilla, layer the sliced chicken, avocado, black beans, and shredded cheese.
Drizzle with sour cream and salsa.
Roll up the tortillas tightly to form burritos.
Serve warm.
